body_html:
Thanks for the info, I did not know about TF_CONFIG. I was not able to reproduce locally by running 3 processes on my local machine, but I didn't try on separate machines. How long does it usually take before the error occurs? I ran for about 30 minutes.

Also, when running with 1 master, 1 worker, and 1 ps, did you set --num_workers=1 (it's set to 2 in your example above).

@ali01 Can you look into this? I wonder if this is related to #11753.
